title: 32k-Mile 2014 Jeep Wrangler Unlimited Sport S
description: This 2014 Jeep Wrangler Unlimited Sport was purchased new by the seller and now has 32k miles. The truck is powered by a 3.6-liter V6 mated to a five-speed automatic transmission and a dual-range transfer case and is finished in Amp'd over black cloth upholstery. Equipment includes 17" AEV wheels, tubular half doors, full metal doors, a removable hardtop, a soft top, a receiver hitch, air conditioning, and a CD stereo. This Wrangler is offered with the owner's manual, service records, a bimini top, a cargo net, a car cover, a clean Carfax report, and a clean Pennsylvania title in the seller's name.
author: bringatrailer
excerpt: Bid for the chance to own a 32k-Mile 2014 Jeep Wrangler Unlimited Sport S at auction with Bring a Trailer, the home of the best vintage and classic cars online. Lot #200,205.
text: This 2014 Jeep Wrangler Unlimited Sport was purchased new by the seller and now has 32k miles. The truck is powered by a 3.6-liter V6 mated to a five-speed automatic transmission and a dual-range transfer case and is finished in Amp’d over black cloth upholstery. Equipment includes 17″ AEV wheels, tubular half doors, full metal doors, a removable hardtop, a soft top, a receiver hitch, air conditioning, and a CD stereo. This Wrangler is offered with the owner’s manual, service records, a bimini top, a cargo net, a car cover, a clean Carfax report, and a clean Pennsylvania title in the seller’s name. The truck is finished in Amp’d Yellow with Renegade decals and features a three-piece removable hardtop, a black soft top, a receiver hitch, tube steps, full metal doors, and half doors. Close-up images of exterior blemishes are provided in the gallery. Black 17″ AEV wheels are mounted with Yokohama tires. Braking is handled by discs at each corner. The cabin features front bucket seats and a rear bench trimmed in black cloth, and amenities include a CD stereo, cruise control, power windows, and air conditioning. The seller states the right-front door lock sometimes doesn’t work via the switch. Instrumentation includes a 100-mph speedometer and a tachometer with a 6,400-rpm redline as well as auxiliary gauges for fuel level and coolant temperature. The digital odometer indicates 32k miles, all of which were added under current ownership. The 3.6-liter Pentastar V6 was factory rated at 285 horsepower and 260 lb-ft of torque. Power is sent to the rear or all four wheels via a five-speed automatic transmission and a dual-range transfer case. A SpiderWebShade sun shade, a cargo net, and a car cover are included in the sale. The Carfax report is free of accidents or other reported damage. You are not connected to real-time updates. Attempting to connect. Your real-time updates could not be connected. html:
This 2014 Jeep Wrangler Unlimited Sport was purchased new by the seller and now has 32k miles. The truck is powered by a 3.6-liter V6 mated to a five-speed automatic transmission and a dual-range transfer case and is finished in Amp’d over black cloth upholstery. Equipment includes 17″ AEV wheels, tubular half doors, full metal doors, a removable hardtop, a soft top, a receiver hitch, air conditioning, and a CD stereo. This Wrangler is offered with the owner’s manual, service records, a bimini top, a cargo net, a car cover, a clean Carfax report, and a clean Pennsylvania title in the seller’s name.

The truck is finished in Amp’d Yellow with Renegade decals and features a three-piece removable hardtop, a black soft top, a receiver hitch, tube steps, full metal doors, and half doors. Close-up images of exterior blemishes are provided in the gallery.

Black 17″ AEV wheels are mounted with Yokohama tires. Braking is handled by discs at each corner.

The cabin features front bucket seats and a rear bench trimmed in black cloth, and amenities include a CD stereo, cruise control, power windows, and air conditioning. The seller states the right-front door lock sometimes doesn’t work via the switch.

Instrumentation includes a 100-mph speedometer and a tachometer with a 6,400-rpm redline as well as auxiliary gauges for fuel level and coolant temperature. The digital odometer indicates 32k miles, all of which were added under current ownership.

The 3.6-liter Pentastar V6 was factory rated at 285 horsepower and 260 lb-ft of torque.

Power is sent to the rear or all four wheels via a five-speed automatic transmission and a dual-range transfer case.

A SpiderWebShade sun shade, a cargo net, and a car cover are included in the sale.

The Carfax report is free of accidents or other reported damage.
